name: perf-workshop
description: Workshop on web performance and developer tools

scripts.build-gh-pages: rm -rf build && reveal-md perf.md --static build --static-dirs=images && mkdir build/_assets && cp style.css build/_assets && cp -a fonts/. build/_assets/fonts/ && touch build/.nojekyll
scripts.build: reveal-md perf.md --static build --static-dirs=images && mkdir build/_assets && cp style.css build/_assets && cp -a fonts/. build/_assets/fonts/
